"A.P.241/10/15 10:00": "I see... It seems that it will take time to fully investigate that world."
"First Luther, now Gettemhart... I don't understand this at all."
"Just when we think we're done rebuilding one nation, now we're fighting in another. This is making my head spin."
"The history of man is the history of war. Just like the history of ARKS and Darkers."
"They say it's relatively peaceful now, but battle still rages on... I wonder if it's like this for other worlds?"
"Everywhere is much like everywhere else. That's why I think Omega is going through a similar situation."
"Xiao, what's the situation in this world?"
"The Black Hole is still expanding, swallowing all worlds near it."
"It's growing at extraordinary speed. Frankly, I'm not optimistic."
"D-Darker readings have been detected in the residential area! We didn't detect any sign of them, they just appeared out of nowhere!"
"Issuing a sortie order to all ARKS... This was a surprise attack. They were able to mask their presence, so be on your guard."
